title: Planar Limits Schema
description: Configuration for the speed and acceleration limits of planar motors

maxAccelRz.description: Maximum acceleration for rotation around Z axis in rad/s²

maxAccelX.description: Maximum acceleration for X axis in m/s²

maxAccelY.description: Maximum acceleration for Y axis in m/s²

maxSpeedRz.description: Maximum speed for rotation around Z axis in rad/s

maxSpeedX.description: Maximum speed for X axis in m/s

maxSpeedY.description: Maximum speed for Y axis in m/s
